ReturnPolicy.Description: For return authorization: Email us through eBay or call customer service Toll FREE 1-888-874-6463 Mon.-Fri. 10am - 5pm. We are closed Saturday and Sunday. If you order the wrong size, don’t like your item, or have simply changed your mind you are welcome to return any unworn or unused item at your expense. Please note the customer pays all shipping costs and a 10% restocking fee both will be deducted from your refund. 5 Star feedback is important to us and our business. If you have a concern or problem; please contact us prior to posting less than a 5 STAR rating. We will try our best to resolve any problem you may have. Please post a 5 STAR Feedback rating and we will do the same. We look forward to future transactions. We appreciate your business.
